name: CMYK (LilOli Games)
description:
Monsters have stolen the colours from the world and now everything is a dull grey. Fight those nasty monsters, one by one, to bring colour back to the world! Fill each bucket and prepare for a final fight against all the colour sucking monsters at once!

CMYK Champ is a game developed with love by Liam (10) and Oli (7) as part of the Global Game Jam 21 with the help of Alexia & Pex.

Liam and Oli are using Construct 3.

January 2021 

-Credits-

Liam - Art and animations

Oliver - Game Design and Programming

Pex - Programming

Alexia - Producer
